name: Parasite in Love
description:
Parasite in Love 

A biological romance horror visual novel 

Infected with the parasite commonly known as the “brain eating amoeba”, you have 10 days left before your death. One of the symptoms is hallucinations. And through that, “he” starts to talk and confesses his love to you. Will you be able to convince the parasite to leave your body before it’s too late? Or will his love consume you “until death do us part”?

This game was made for the Spooktober VN Jam 2022.

Body Horror and Tokophobia (Fear of Pregnancy). 

Player discretion is advised. 

This game also contains flashing lights, animated effects, and vivid colors which may not be suitable for some players.

There is a "Reduce Motion" option in the game settings should you wish to turn off the animation and transition effects.


  • 8.5k words
  • 4 endings 
  • 8 CGs
  • atmospheric music 
  • hauntingly beautiful art 
  • partial voice acting, fully voice acted endings 
  • plot-consistent UI changes
